duties_responsibilities.duty: Diagnose and repair complex industrial equipment including auger compactors, shredders, balers, and ram compactors.
Perform regular maintenance on industrial machines to ensure their optimal functionality and minimize downtime.
Read and comprehend schematics to troubleshoot and repair technical issues.
Travel out of town with overnight stays to service equipment as needed.
Work independently with little supervision to meet customer service needs and exceed expectations.
Complete service reports and documentation accurately and in a timely manner.
Physical ability to lift up to 50 lbs and work overtime as necessary.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED equivalent (Associate's degree in related field preferred)
